Control: Ensure redundancy is available in case of IoT devices being unavailable.
Ensure web application firewall is enabled where available
Perform security architecture and design exercise to identify security services to be installed and install identified security services.
Ensure all devices do not make network ports and/or services available to the internet
Ensure all devices operate with a minimal number of network ports active
Enable a firewall and ensure that it can only be accessed from your client systems
Enable network segmentation technologies such as firewalls to isolate IoT systems from critical IT systems
For products with multiple network interfaces -  the uncontrolled ability to forward IP packets between the interfaces is disabled.r
